name: SFKeychainSettingsPanel
desc: A panel or sheet that allows users to change their keychain settings.

items.name: func beginSheet(for: NSWindow!, modalDelegate: Any!, didEnd: Selector!, contextInfo: UnsafeMutableRawPointer!, settings: UnsafeMutablePointer<SecKeychainSettings>!, keychain: SecKeychain!)
items.desc: Displays a sheet that allows users to change keychain settings.

items.name: func runModal(for: UnsafeMutablePointer<SecKeychainSettings>!, keychain: SecKeychain!) -> Int
items.desc: Displays a panel that allows users to change keychain settings.

items.name: class func shared() -> SFKeychainSettingsPanel!
items.desc: Returns a shared keychain settings panel object.
